aws:forecast.aws:title: Tonight
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers and thunderstorms in the evening...then isolated showers and thunderstorms after midnight. Some thunderstorms may be severe in the evening. Lows in the upper 60s. Southeast winds 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40 percent in the evening decreasing to 20 percent after midnight.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Thursday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly cloudy in the morning then becoming partly cloudy. A 50 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some thunderstorms may be severe in the afternoon. Highs in the lower 80s. Southeast winds 10 to 15 mph.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Thursday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Partly cloudy with a 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms in the evening...then mostly cloudy with a 20 percent chance after midnight. Some thunderstorms may be severe in the evening. Lows in the upper 60s. South winds 5 to 10 mph.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Friday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly cloudy with a 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms in the morning...then partly cloudy with a 40 percent chance in the afternoon. Highs in the lower 80s. South winds 10 to 15 mph.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Friday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Partly cloudy until late night then clearing. A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms in the evening... Then a 20 percent chance of showers after midnight. Breezy. Much cooler. Lows in the mid 40s. Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Saturday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly sunny. Cooler. Highs in the lower 60s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Saturday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Clear. Lows around 40. Highs in the lower 70s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Sunday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Clear. Lows around 40. Highs in the lower 70s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Sunday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly clear. Warmer. Lows in the mid 50s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Monday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Partly cloudy. Highs in the upper 70s. Lows in the lower 50s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Monday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Partly cloudy. Highs in the upper 70s. Lows in the lower 50s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Tuesday
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Mostly sunny. Highs in the upper 70s.

aws:forecast.aws:title: Tuesday Night
aws:forecast.aws:prediction: Partly cloudy. Warmer. Lows in the lower 60s.
